source.query:
SELECT distinct
vh.vehicle_vid,
Replace(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.frontAxleType'),'"','') as frontaxletype,
Replace(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.rearAxleLoad'),'"','') as rearaxleload,
Replace(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.rearAxleRatio'),'"','') as rearaxleratio,
Replace(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.tyreSizeRear1'),'"','') as TyreRearsize,
Replace(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.tyreSizeFrontAxle1'),'"','') as TyreFrontsize
from cle_pc_cvp_fap.vehicle vh
left join daf.co_connected_object co
on co.internal_id = vh.vehicle_vid
left join daf.co_connected_object_type typ
on typ.id = co.connected_object_type
left join daf.co_third_party prty
on typ.third_party_id = prty.id
where (Replace(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.frontAxleType'),'"','') is not null OR 
Replace(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.rearAxleLoad'),'"','') IS NOT NULL or
Replace(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.rearAxleRatio'),'"','') IS NOT NULL OR
Replace(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.tyreSizeRear1'),'"','')  IS NOT NULL OR
Replace(JSON_EXTRACT(co.metadata,'$.tyreSizeFrontAxle1'),'"','') IS NOT NULL);

do
$$
declare
    f record;
begin
    for f in SELECT vehicle_vid,frontaxletype,rearaxleload,rearaxleratio,TyreRearsize,TyreFrontsize
	from public.vehicleaxleproperties
    loop	    
	 INSERT INTO staging.Vehicleaxleproperties_CHG
	 (
		 vehicle_id,
axle_type,
position,
type,
springs,
load,
ratio,
is_wheel_tire_size_replaced,
size
)
	VALUES ((select id from master.vehicle where vid =f.vehicle_vid),
			'F', 1, f.frontaxletype, null,null, null, 'N',f.TyreFrontsize) ;	 
	   end loop;
end;
$$;
